title: New Giants QB Wilson: 'I expect to be the starter'
content: Russell Wilson said he expects to be the starting quarterback of a Giants team that also signed Jameis Winston as a free agent and could be in the market for a quarterback in this year's draft.

title: LeBron opens up on relationship with idol Jordan
content: LeBron James opened up about the current relationship between him and Michael Jordan as part of a wide-ranging interview that aired Wednesday on "The Pat McAfee Show."

title: Hurley: Regret remarks, but not changing as coach
content: UConn coach Dan Hurley acknowledged there are things that "I wish I didn't do" as he expressed regret over making profane comments about the officiating after the Huskies' NCAA tournament loss to Florida on Sunday.

title: Mavs' Irving has successful surgery on torn ACL
content: Mavericks All-Star Kyrie Irving underwent successful surgery to repair his torn left ACL on Wednesday at Hospital for Special Surgery in New York City, the team announced.

title: Police: UGA's Tuggle driving 107 mph upon arrest
content: Georgia wide receiver Nitro Tuggle was driving 107 mph before he was stopped and arrested by police on March 19, according to an Athens-Clarke County Police Department incident report.

title: NFL expects more returns if kickoff pitch passes
content: The NFL competition committee is recommending making the dynamic kickoff rule permanent and moving touchbacks to the 35-yard line in hopes of generating even more returns.

title: Scaloni: Stop pressuring Messi over '26 World Cup
content: Argentina coach Lionel Scaloni said Lionel Messi will decide whenever he wants if he plays at the 2026 World Cup.

title: Books set historically low win total for White Sox
content: The White Sox open the season with a consensus over/under of 53.5 wins, the lowest betting total for sportsbooks in over 35 years.

title: Predicting the women's Sweet 16: The case for and against every team to reach the regional final
content: Why might every Sweet 16 team win its regional semifinal matchup in Birmingham and Spokane? We predict the winners.

title: Tannenbaum plays GM for every NFL team in Round 1: Should the Giants still take a QB at No. 3?
content: Mike Tannenbaum puts his GM hat on and makes his own first-round selections. See why he's taking Cam Ward and Ashton Jeanty early.

title: This NFL hopeful was banned by the NCAA in gambling probe -- but could he still have an NFL future?
content: After a big junior college season, and working with Jon Gruden, ex-Iowa State QB Hunter Dekkers believes he's ready for the NFL.

title: World Cup Onside/Offside: Will Argentina repeat? Will Spain win? USA has work to do
content: With the international break done and dusted with all the major World Cup contenders in action, who's looking sharp right now and who needs work in the next 14 months? LME breaks it down.

title: The divergent fortunes of U.S.'s Pochettino, Mexico's Aguirre
content: While Mauricio Pochettino's team has yet to lift off, Javier Aguirre's Mexico squad has already lifted silverware.

title: Davies' agent slams Canada staff over ACL tear
content: Alphonso Davies' agent hit out at the player's treatment by Canada staff after it was announced that he has suffered a torn ACL against the United States, saying that the Bayern Munich star was "pressured" to play despite not being fully fit.

title: Boston's NWSL team reveals new name -- again
content: In a move to recover from a disastrous branding rollout five months ago, the expansion NWSL team has announced Boston Legacy Football Club as its new franchise name, superseding BOS Nation FC.

title: Source: Onana wants Utd stay, plans to rebuff SPL
content: André Onana intends to stay at Manchester United even if he receives an offer from Saudi Arabia, a source has told ESPN.

title: Chelsea fans call for Boehly ticket site probe
content: Chelsea fans have asked the Premier League to investigate co-owner Todd Boehly's links to a ticket resale site.

title: Vini: Brazil must 'rethink everything' after loss
content: Vinícius Júnior has called for Brazil to push the reset button following their alarming 4-1 defeat at Argentina in Tuesday's World Cup qualifier.

title: Cushing: Shaw, Fujino out for Chelsea QF 2nd leg
content: Manchester City boss Nick Cushing has confirmed that forwards Khadija Shaw and Aoba Fujino will miss the second leg of the Champions League quarterfinal against Chelsea on Wednesday.

title: Flick 'not happy' with Osasuna game scheduling
content: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick has said he is "not happy" about having to play against Osasuna on Thursday on the back of the international break, but attempted to keep counsel on the matter.

title: Club World Cup winners to get up to $125m
content: The winners of this year's 32-team Club World Cup to be held in the U.S. will earn up to $125 million, FIFA said on Wednesday.

title: Who wins LaLiga: Atlético, Barcelona or Real Madrid? Title race talking points
content: LaLiga returns with Atleti, Barça and Madrid all after the title. ESPN's Alex Kirkland, Sam Marsden, Sid Lowe, Graham Hunter answer the key questions.

title: Paige Bueckers' pursuit: The national championship that keeps getting away
content: Will Paige Bueckers win an elusive NCAA title or become the greatest UConn player to graduate without one?

title: You can't stop Cooper Flagg: 'He wants to win every possession'
content: Arizona's best chance of defending Duke's star is by limiting him. Here's how -- and why it might not be enough.

title: Top seed Boston College plays with Gaudreaus, Voce close to hearts
content: Three former Eagles died this past summer. The current team hopes to win a national title in their memory.

title: Watkins' devastating injury shakes up women's NCAA tournament landscape
content: JuJu Watkins' torn ACL changes the 2025 women's title race, and the effects could linger into next season.

title: WNBA mock draft: Where does USC's Iriafen land after No. 1 Bueckers?
content: Azzi Fudd is returning to UConn, but Kiki Iriafen, Hailey Van Lith and Georgia Amoore have upped their stock ahead of April's WNBA draft.

title: Pain Index: Whose 2025 NCAA tournament loss hurt most?
content: Some losses are understandable; others will haunt us forever. Let's break down the 2025 men's NCAA tournament defeats.

title: NBA betting: Why you should fade the Celtics in these two markets
content: The Celtics lead two key futures markets entering Wednesday night's game but here's why bettors should be cautious.

title: Sources: Tsunoda to replace Lawson for Red Bull in Japan
content: Yuki Tsunoda will replace Red Bull's Liam Lawson at the Japanese Grand Prix, sources have confirmed to ESPN.

title: EA Sports F1 25 release date, details, cover revealed
content: EA Sports' latest racing game is set to be released on May 30, 2025, for PC, PS5, and Xbox Series X|S.

title: MLB The Show 25 Review: Small but worthwhile upgrades
content: MLB The Show 25 doesn't revolutionize the genre, but it's the best game in the series with some fun ideas.

title: Mikaela Mayer-Sandy Ryan rivalry explained: All you need to know
content: Ahead of their rematch on Saturday, we look at the Mayer vs. Ryan feud, the paint incident, and more.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Newcastle eyeing move for Quansah
content: Liverpool defender Jarell Quansah is a target for Newcastle United. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Kozhikode Corporation formulates comprehensive plan for city beautification
content: The Urban rejuvenation and Beautification programme includes development of Mananchira area into a walking zone and recreation zone along Conolly canal

title: Navy chief inaugurates new North Jetty at Naval Base
content: Extending 300 metres in length and 18 metres in width, the jetty is designed to berth various classes of naval ships

title: Ruling, Opposition councillors lock horns over Kochi Corporation Budget
content: While the LDF hailed the Budget as one that positively influenced all aspects of city life, the Opposition UDF termed it as one that powered development projects through debts by pawning the civic body’s assets

title: Centre aims to increase oil seed production to 70 million tonnes by 2031
content: The National Mission on Edible Oils – Oilseeds has been launched with an outlay of ₹10,103.38 crore to make India self-reliant in edible oil production, says Union Minister

title: Tunnel collapse: Strong odour at a particular location of SLBC tunnel
content: So far, two bodies have been recovered and efforts are on to recover the remaining six missing personnel.

title: Chinese scholars to visit Visva Bharati to mark 75 years of India-China diplomatic ties
content: Chinese Consul General in Kolkata Xu Wei said that Rabindranath Tagore, who visited China in 1924, is the symbol of India-China friendship

title: Ministry of Defence signs contracts worth ₹6,900 crore with Bharat Forge, Tata for 307 indigenous artillery guns
content: Being the first major procurement of towed guns from the private sector by the Indian Army, the project will provide a boost to the Indian gun manufacturing industry in particular and the indigenous defence manufacturing ecosystem as a whole, the Ministry said

title: Congress intensifies its protest on crime against women in Odisha
content: Acting on instructions from Congress central leadership, party MLAs are deliberately attempting to derail the Budget session, said State Law Minister Prithiviraj Harichandan

title: India, U.S. holding very active and intense discussions on trade: Jaishankar
content: External Affairs Minister said that they had an open discussion and it resulted to have a bilateral trade agreement by fall this year

title: Vertical launch short range SAM for Navy test fired
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh described the missile as an excellent force multiplier for the Indian Navy

title: Govt will protect farming interests in talks with U.S., says EAM Jaishankar
content: The farmer’s front Samyukt Kisan Morcha has said that they will hold protests demanding that the U.S. delegation ‘must go back’

title: Election Commission begins training programme for grassroot electoral officials
content: The first batch of the officials make up those from Bihar, West Bengal, and Assam, the States where Assembly elections are imminent

title: MPs briefed on role of Bangladesh Army Chief in stability
content: Foreign Secretary Misri discusses Bangladesh’s internal issues, Army Chief’s role, and India-Bangladesh relations with Parliament’s Standing Committee

title: IPKF veterans commemorate fallen soldiers, demand official recognition
content: Veterans have been demanding official recognition and earmarking a day for commemorating the Indian Peace Keeping Force

title: Kunal Kamra criticises T-Series after visibility of ‘Naya Bharat’ video blocked on YouTube
content: Mumbai Police issue second notice to the comedian for derogatory remarks against Maharashtra Deputy CM Eknath Shinde

title: A.P. CM sets target of 15% growth rate for State in Collectors’ Conference
content: Every district must play a crucial role in achieving this goal by leveraging its unique resources and opportunities, Naidu tells District Collectors

title: Over half of ₹1-lakh crore collected for the welfare of mining districts not spent: report
content: Funds are often diverted to activities that are not directly linked to the welfare of mining districts, it says

title: U.S. intelligence report flags India, China as key sources of drug trafficking equipment, chemicals
content: The 2025 intelligence report says China remains the main source country for illicit fentanyl precursor chemicals and pill pressing equipment, followed by India

title: Allahabad HC judge’s remarks on rape of minor, and challenges faced by nursing community feature in Lok Sabha Zero Hour
content: Senior Congress leader K.C. Venugopal called for a single national registration system for nurses, along with faster issuance of NUIDs, and implementation of the Supreme Court’s salary guidelines

title: SC dismisses plea for CBI probe into Karnataka honey-trap allegations
content: Karnataka Cooperation Minister Rajanna had claimed that he and 48 others, including legislators, Central leaders, and judges, were victims of honey-trapping

title: India needs more undersea cables for telecom, internet traffic, experts say
content: Undersea cables landing in India represent only 1% of the global total; proactive approach needed to guard against strategic risks and meet future growth needs, experts say

title: ED attaches ₹557 crore assets in Amtek Auto case
content: The probe is based on the SC’s directive to the ED in 2023, issued while hearing a PIL against the Amtek Auto group of companies; bank fraud to the tune of ₹27,000 crore was alleged

title: Advocates begin indefinite boycott of courts in Vaniyambadi demanding new court complex
content: Plastering of a dilapidated Judicial Magistrate court building that peeled off on Tuesday evening. No one was injured in the incident. Advocates demand safety of people including litigants and court officials

title: Betting and gambling are State subjects, says Union Minister Ashwini Vaishnaw
content: He was responding to a question raised by DMK MP Dayanidhi Maran during Question Hour in the Lok Sabha

title: India, China discuss ways to move ties to ‘predictable path’
content: The Ministry of External Affairs said the two sides took positive note of the developments in bilateral relations since the meeting of the leaders of India and China in October 2024.

title: Media bodies express concern over arrest of digital media journalist
content: Media bodies urged all governments and law enforcement agencies to uphold the constitutional values of press freedom and to refrain from using criminal laws to intimidate or harass journalists

title: Watch | News Wrap: Rahul questions Lok Sabha Speaker, Edappadi Palaniswami denies alliance talks with BJP & more
content: From Rahul Gandhi’s alleged denial to speak in Lok Sabha to the buzz on a possible AIADMK-BJP alliance, let’s take a look at the stories that making headlines today.

title: If voted to power, reservation will upped to Telangana standards, Bihar Congress says
content: Bihar Congress incharge Krishna Allavaru stressed that the share of the people would be decided based on the economic and caste survey

title: Karni Sena creates ruckus outside SP MP’s house over remark on Rajput ruler Rana Sanga
content: Caste group activists attack SP MP’s house after he claimed the 16th century Rajput ruler had invited Babur to defeat Ibrahim Lodi.

title: West Bengal BJP questions Iftar celebrations in State-run colleges, universities
content: Opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari claims this new trend is to garner votes for 2026 Assembly elections

title: Many welfare projects announced at Thirissur Corporation’s silver jubilee Budget
content: A sum of ₹2 crore has been allocated for educational expense of 100 underprivileged students pursuing professional courses

title: J&K Police raid houses of 16 separatists ‘to dismantle remnants of secessionism’
content: Officials said the searches were conducted after obtaining search warrants from the Special Judge designated under the NIA Act in Srinagar

title: UPI outage disrupts digital transactions
content: The system faced temporary issue for about an hour or so and it was subsequently stabilised by the National Payments Corporation of India

title: TB awareness friendly cricket matches to be held in various cities: Anurag Thakur
content: The former Union Minister says Prime Minister Narendra Modi has set the goal of making India TB-free by 2025

title: Gold dealer from Ballari arrested for ‘aiding’ Ranya Rao dispose smuggled gold
content: DRI accused gold dealer Sahil Jain from Ballari of “assisting and abetting Ranya Rao in disposing the smuggled gold and sharing the sale proceeds, which is an offence under Customs Act, 1962”

title: CJI lauds judiciary’s direct connect with people
content: However, SC judge says not ‘substantially’ true to claim common man has full faith in judicial institution

title: COVID-19 lockdown: How India shut down and opened gradually to battle a pandemic
content: From the initial 21-day total lockdown to returning to normalcy, Indians hunkered down at home as the nation faced two waves of Coronavirus infection

title: Campus bird census at city school records 35 species
content: The bird census on the school campus aimed to document the diversity of bird species on campus, track population trends, and contribute valuable data to ongoing conservation effort

title: Breeding colonies of six more seabirds recorded on unique sandbars of Adam’s Bridge
content: The findings, made by a group of researchers in collaboration with the Tamil Nadu Forest Department, are published in the Journal of Threatened Taxa; Breeding colonies of these birds stresses the need for improved conservation efforts on the sandbars, says H. Byju, one of the researchers

title: Lok Sabha passes law to set up Tribhuvan Sahkari University in Gujarat; to train people for the cooperative sector
content: University to be named after Amul founder; RSP MP’s proposal to name IRMA after Verghese Kurien struck down; University to have nationwide jurisdiction, register State cooperative training institutes

title: Machilipatnam MP seeks NDMA help to solve sea erosion at Chinna Gollapalem
content: Machilipatnam MP urges NDMA to address sea erosion at Chinna Gollapalem, proposing sea walls, mangrove conservation, and farmer aid

title: KEA to deploy facial recognition technology at all CET centres this year
content: Officials told to appoint an additional invigilator for every 100 candidates for verification of students entering the exam hall

title: BJP has expelled me for fighting against corruption and dynastic politics: Yatnal
content: He declares that the decision will not deter his fight against corruption, family politics, and the cause of development of North Karnataka and Hindutva

title: Non-performing assets of banks at multi-year low, profits up: Finance Minister
content: The government is committed to taking stringent action against wilful defaulters, says Nirmala Sitharaman

title: Lifer for Shamshabad priest for niece’s murder
content: The accused had killed his niece after she pressured him to marry her. He dumped her body in a drainage manhole, covering it with soil and cement in June 2023

title: 1.5 lakh blooming tulips acts as good omen for Kashmir’s tourism sector
content: Located at an altitude of 5,600 feet, the Indira Gandhi Memorial Tulip Garden with Zabarwan Hills in the backdrop was curated by former Chief Minister Ghulam Nabi Azad

title: ‘P4’ an ambitious initiative to achieve zero poverty in Andhra Pradesh by 2047
content: Andhra Pradesh launches ‘Zero Poverty - P4 Policy’ to eradicate poverty by 2047 through public-private partnerships

title: Congress to have internal committee to formulate position on delimitation
content: Congress general secretary K.C. Venugopal said that, as a national party, the Congress would have to ‘take a multi-dimensional view on the subject’

title: A.P. government gears up for grand Ugadi celebrations on March 30
content: The celebrations will have cultural events, felicitation ceremonies, and the traditional Panchanga Sravanam across multiple locations

title: Pandemonium over Hazaribagh stone pelting in Jharkhand Assembly
content: Leader of Opposition Babulal Marandi accused the Soren’s government of doing politics of appeasement even as the State government said the BJP wants to impose President’s rule in Jharkhand

title: GST 2.0 needed to streamline procedures, ease compliance through tiered approach: PAC
content: PAC seeks comprehensive review of GST framework with stakeholder consultation; flags criminal penalties for unintentional errors; suggests data analytics, AI tools for revenue projection, compliance tracking

title: CPI(M) announces political and legal battle against Centre’s subversion of ED for BJP’s political ends
content: The ED’s clean chit to BJP leaders in the 2021 Kodakara hawala case exposed the anti-money laundering agency’s Janus-faced political nature, says Govindan

title: Three-member team formed to probe into Hyderabad pastor’s death
content: Police await forensic report; Praveen Kumar’s body handed over to his family after the completion of post-mortem examination on Wednesday

title: Orissa High Court issues notice in challenge against APAAR ID mandate in school
content: A parent in Bhubaneswar filed a petition against the government of Odisha and the Union government after his daughter’s school refused to relent on an enrolment mandate for the student ID

title: Lalu and Tejashwi join AIMPLB protest against Waqf Bill in Patna
content: RJD says it will continue to protest till the Bill is withdrawn; In an indirect attack on Nitish, Lalu accuses NDA constituents of supporting BJP’s policies for power

title: ED files final complaint against K. Babu in wealth amassment case
content: ED investigation came after the State Vigilance booked a case against the former Excise Minister for wealth amassment

title: New budget to focus on creation of infrastructure across city, says Nellore Mayor
content: With an estimated expenditure of Rs. 695.5 crore, the new budget aims to provide welfare measures to the people

title: NIHFW to start training module to reduce doctor-patient conflict
content: The institute is also looking into conducting training programmes for vaccine and cold-chain management for the updated solar cold-chain equipment being used by low electricity supply areas in India

title: US cancels 2,000 visa appointments made by ‘bots’
content: The United States is cracking down on bots blocking visa interview appointments in India, forcing applicants to pay agents up to Rs 35,000 for timely slots. The US embassy has cancelled about 2,000 bot-made appointments and is suspending the associated accounts’ scheduling privileges to combat fraud.

title: Trump announces 25% tariffs on imported cars: How it may help Musk and Tesla
content: US President Donald Trump announced a 25% tariff on all imported vehicles and key auto parts, impacting Tesla and other automakers. Although Tesla assembles its cars in the US, it relies on foreign parts, increasing production costs. Analysts predict price hikes and reduced vehicle production across North America, exacerbating Tesla's market challenges amid rising competition.

title: 'Political black comedy at its darkest': Stalin slams Yogi's 'hate' remark
content: Tamil Nadu CM MK Stalin criticizes UP CM Yogi Adityanath for his comments on the three-language policy and delimitation, accusing the BJP of being rattled by Tamil Nadu's stance. Stalin emphasizes opposition to the imposition of Hindi and calls for dignity and justice.

title: ‘Tense relationship serves neither side’: Jaishankar on India-China ties
content: India and China are striving to mend ties post the 2020 Galwan valley clashes, with some issues still outstanding. External affairs minister S Jaishankar emphasized the significance of managing differences constructively, noting that peace at the border is crucial for the overall relationship between the two nations.

title: Stock market today: BSE Sensex opens flat; Nifty50 below 23,500
content: Stock market today: BSE Sensex and Nifty50, the Indian equity benchmark indices, opened flat in trade on Thursday. While BSE Sensex was near 77,300, Nifty50 was below 23,500.

title: Amazon founder Jeff Bezos on what changed about Donald Trump this term
content: Jeff Bezos noted significant changes in President Trump during his second term, highlighting his calmer and more confident demeanor. He appreciates the administration's efforts towards reducing regulations and fostering dialogue with business leaders, signifying an improved relationship between the two influential figures.

title: Personal information of Trump's security officials found online: Report
content: The personal and sensitive information of senior advisers in Trump's administration, including mobile numbers, email addresses, and passwords, have been leaked online. This data, connected to various digital platforms, could be used for phishing attacks and cyber threats, highlighting significant security risks.

title: Gold smuggling case: DRI arrests K'taka businessman who 'helped' Ranya Rao
content: The DRI has arrested Ballari-based jeweller Sahil Sakariya Jain for his involvement in an extensive gold smuggling racket with Sandalwood actor Ranya Rao. Sahil aided Ranya in smuggling 14.5 kg of gold, resulting in a significant financial loss to the exchequer. Investigations revealed frequent communications and assistance in disposing of the smuggled gold.

title: 'B’desh Liberation War shared history’: PM Modi pens letter to Yunus
content: Prime Minister Modi congratulated Bangladesh on their National Day, emphasizing the importance of mutual sensitivity to each other's interests. This comes ahead of their meeting at the Bimstec summit. External affairs minister S Jaishankar hinted a bilateral meeting during the summit is under consideration. President Murmu also echoed the commitment to strong, multifaceted relations with Bangladesh.

title: ChatGPT's Ghibli style photos make internet go crazy as it rolls out GPT-4o
content: OpenAI has launched a new feature for GPT-4o enabling native image generation based on text prompts. Users can create and edit images, with a trending capability to transform photos into Studio Ghibli-inspired artwork. This update has sparked widespread excitement online.

title: Cricket players' body report questions ICC revenue distribution
content: World Cricketers' Association raises questions over functioning of cricket but evades direct "on-record" questions on the findings of the report

title: 'Dumped body in manhole': Priest gets life for killing aspiring actor
content: A priest, Iyyagari Venkata Sai Krishna, was sentenced to life imprisonment for murdering aspiring TV actress, Kuruganti Apsara, in June 2023. He bludgeoned her to death and concealed her body in a sealed manhole. The court fined him Rs 10 lakh.

title: Gavaskar questions if Gambhir will emulate Dravid
content: Sunil Gavaskar highlights Rahul Dravid's decision to share prize money equally among his support staff after the T20 World Cup, questioning if current coach Gautam Gambhir will do the same following the Champions Trophy win. Gavaskar praised BCCI's generous financial rewards for players and staff, demonstrating appreciation for their efforts.

title: Pakistani YouTuber posts video with Koran amid Blasphemy charges over perfume
content: Pakistani YouTuber Rajab Butt faces blasphemy charges after releasing a perfume named "295," provoking outrage. Following a formal complaint, Butt apologized with a Koran in hand, discontinued the product, and pleaded for understanding from Mecca. Legal consequences remain uncertain, risking up to 10 years in prison.

title: Watch: Masked ICE agents detain Turkish student over pro-Palestine activism
content: A Turkish doctoral student, Rumeysa Ozturk, was detained by federal immigration agents due to her pro-Palestinian activism. With a valid student visa, Ozturk's arrest and subsequent transfer to Louisiana have drawn scrutiny and legal challenges, citing potential violations of her rights and court orders.

title: 'Jitni umar likhi hai ... ': Salman on death threats from Lawrence Bishnoi
content: Salman Khan has reacted to death threats while he's promoting his upcoming movie 'Sikandar' which is set to release on Eid, March 30. It sees him alongside Rashmika Mandanna.

title: Cattle block Delhi CM’s convoy in Delhi, she steps out to inspect situation
content: Chief Minister Rekha Gupta's convoy was delayed for 15 minutes on a Delhi flyover due to stray cattle. She instructed the development department to provide shelter for the cattle and initiated a policy to relocate stray cattle citywide. Rs 40 crore has been allocated for a modern cow shelter in Ghumanhera village.

title: 'Have already spent Rs 80 lakh': Cop holds revolver at wife’s head, demands dowry
content: A police sub-inspector, Kishore, his parents, and brother-in-law have been booked for threatening Kishore's wife with a service revolver over dowry demands. Kishore allegedly beat her regularly and demanded Rs 10 lakh for better posting and monthly payments of Rs 50,000 from her parents.

title: Trump signs 25% auto tariff order; markets slump, allies consider countermeasures
content: US president Donald Trump signed an executive order imposing a 25% tariff on foreign-manufactured vehicles, effective from April 2. The move has triggered threats of retaliation from trading partners, with significant impacts already seen in Asian automotive markets. Japan and Canada are evaluating counter-measures, while additional trade levies are expected next week.

title: Punjab to hold first-ever census on drug addiction
content: The AAP government in Punjab plans to conduct its first-ever census to gather data on drug addiction, de-addiction centres, and the socio-economic status of affected individuals. In the 'Badalda Punjab Budget,' the government aims to enhance health insurance coverage and combat cross-border drug smuggling, with a projected debt of almost Rs 4.2 lakh crore.

title: India, China meet again, discuss ways to address ‘priority areas’
content: Indian and Chinese officials continued their discussions in Beijing to restart dialogue mechanisms and improve bilateral relations. Both sides agreed to enhance people-to-people exchanges, including direct flights and media interactions. Plans to resume the Kailash Manasarovar Yatra in 2025 were also advanced.

title: Tesla CEO Elon Musk: 'No more loans to...' as DOGE fights loan fraud
content: Elon Musk supports the new SBA policy to prevent fraud involving stolen Social Security numbers, requiring applicants’ date of birth for direct loans. Measures include halting loans for those under 18 or over 120 years old, addressing past fraudulent cases and improving data integrity in federal loan programs.

title: 'Signal chat leak consequences for American pilots could have been catastrophic'
content: A major security breach in President Trump's administration revealed operational details of airstrikes against Yemeni Houthis via a leaked Signal chat. Top officials, including the defense secretary and national security adviser, were involved in the discussions. Despite the leak, the White House claims no classified information was compromised. This incident has raised concerns about the administration's handling of sensitive information.

title: IPL 2025: Who leads the Orange Cap and Purple Cap standings?
content: The IPL 2025 race for the Orange and Purple Caps begins with Ishan Kishan leading the Orange Cap standings, scoring 106 not out off 47 balls for SRH. CSK's Noor Ahmad heads the Purple Cap leaderboard with a 4/18 performance against MI. Significant contributions from RR’s Dhruv Jurel and others highlight early standout performances.

title: 12 days on, cops seal storeroom at HC judge Yashwant Varma’s house
content: Delhi Police have sealed the storeroom at Justice Yashwant Varma's residence and conducted videography after a fire incident allegedly destroyed cash. They obtained CCTV footage, but preliminary analysis showed no unauthorized entry. Two senior officers reviewed call and internet details of the judge's cellphone. The fire, which occurred on March 14, is being investigated by police and fire department.

title: IPL 2025: Super De Kock dazzles as KKR thrash Royals
content: Kolkata Knight Riders secured their first IPL 2025 win with an emphatic eight-wicket victory over Rajasthan Royals, led by Quinton de Kock's explosive innings. Under new captain Ajinkya Rahane, KKR's disciplined bowling restricted RR to 151, which they chased down comfortably. With this dominant win, KKR not only got off the mark in IPL 2025 but also sent a strong statement to their rivals. Under Rahane’s leadership, the team has gained momentum, with de Kock leading the charge in spectacular fashion.

title: 'I expect to be the starter': Russell Wilson breaks silence on Giants’ offseason wait
content: The Pittsburgh Steelers were primarily focused on pursuing Aaron Rodgers as their quarterback. Consequently, Russell Wilson decided to sign with the New York Giants. Wilson, now their starting QB, aims to lead the Giants effectively. Meanwhile, the Steelers remain patient, awaiting Rodgers' decision, which could significantly impact the team's future.

title: Asaram ashram to give way to Olympic sports facility
content: Preparations for the 2036 Olympics in Ahmedabad include acquiring land from three ashrams, such as Sant Shree Asaram Ashram, to develop the Sardar Patel Sports Enclave and Olympic Village. The master plan involves approximately 650 acres near the Narendra Modi Stadium, with land finalizations and relocations underway.

title: 'The Diplomat' box office collection day 13
content: John Abraham's film 'The Diplomat' enters its second week with steady collections, reaching a total of ₹28.10 crore despite a drop on its second Monday. Meanwhile, Vicky Kaushal's 'Chhaava' outperforms 'Diplomat' in its sixth week, amassing a total of ₹586.35 crore.

title: Chennai police kill snatcher from Maharashtra gang
content: Chennai police shot dead Jaffer Gulam Hussain Irani, a member of the Irani gang, when he attempted to pull out a gun after snatching six chains from elderly women. Irani and his accomplices had planned to flee the city before the police intercepted them at the airport.

title: Bengaluru judge under lens for citing non-existent SC orders
content: The Karnataka high court has recommended action against a city civil judge in Bengaluru for referencing non-existent Supreme Court judgments in a ruling. The case involves plaintiffs who sought injunctions against lenders. The high court has asked for an investigation and appropriate action.

title: Bangladesh ignoring calls to protect minorities: Vikram Misri
content: Foreign secretary Vikram Misri has expressed concern over the lack of acknowledgment from the Muhammad Yunus-led interim government in Bangladesh regarding the systematic persecution of minorities, particularly Hindus. The release of violent Islamic extremists has also been termed a significant threat to security.

title: SC stays Allahabad HC’s ‘not-rape’ verdict
content: The Supreme Court has stayed an Allahabad HC order that deemed grabbing a minor's breasts and snapping her pyjama string insufficient for rape charges. Justices B R Gavai and A G Masih criticized the HC judgment for insensitivity and a lack of proper legal framework.

title: 'Thousands wishing you luck': Secret note found in Luigi Mangione's socks
content: A hidden note of encouragement was found in the socks of Luigi Mangione, accused of murdering UnitedHealthcare CEO Brian Thompson. The court filing also revealed another message addressed to 'Joan,' while Mangione's supporters wore green in solidarity at the hearing. Mangione faces multiple charges both in state and federal courts.

title: Cops issue second notice to Kunal Kamra for appearance
content: Khar police issued a second notice to comedian Kunal Kamra for not appearing in a defamation case filed by deputy CM Eknath Shinde, who was alluded to as 'gaddar' in Kamra's video. Kamra's lawyer requested a week’s time. T-Series requested YouTube to take down Kamra's video for copyright infringement over using their song.

title: Betting app: CBI searches Bhupesh Baghel houses
content: CBI conducted searches at multiple residences in Raipur and Bhilai in connection with the Mahadev Book app betting scam. Among those searched were former CM Bhupesh Baghel's residence and those of several top officials. The operation encompassed 60 locations across multiple states.

title: Karnataka pulls out affidavit in DKS support from SC
content: In a surprising move, the Karnataka government withdrew its affidavit defending the decision to revoke consent for a CBI probe into deputy CM D K Shivakumar’s alleged disproportionate assets. The state aims to file a stronger affidavit. The previous government’s approval for a CBI investigation was deemed illegal due to inadequate supporting material and concerns over state police competence.

title: ‘I’m a woman & dark, time I own both': Kerala chief secretary Sarada Muraleedharan
content: Kerala chief secretary Sarada Muraleedharan confronted a racially insulting remark about her skin colour, responding with a powerful message against societal biases. She emphasized her pride in her identity and this sparked widespread support, highlighting persistent discrimination even at high levels of authority.

title: ‘Entity of concern’: Government lashes out at USCIRF
content: The Indian government criticized the US Commission on International Religious Freedom (USCIRF) for its annual report, which raised concerns about India's treatment of minorities and recommended sanctions against RAW. The foreign ministry accused USCIRF of a biased agenda and misrepresenting India's multicultural society.

title: Bangladesh plan to redefine ‘muktijoddha’ yet again stirs a debate in West Bengal
content: Deliberations are underway in Kolkata to redefine the term 'bir muktijoddha' to only include battlefield fighters and classify others as 'Liberation War Associates'. This proposal has sparked debates and raised concerns about the recognition and possible ignoring of genuine freedom fighters and the distorting of historical contributions.

title: 'Muslims are safest in UP': CM Yogi's take on minorities, oppn, Kunal Kamra
content: Uttar Pradesh CM Yogi Adityanath addresses critical issues in politics and governance, affirming communal harmony, accusing opposition of foreign interference in elections, and defending controversial policies. Adityanath also calls for legal action against comedian Kunal Kamra’s divisive remarks.

title: Appeals court rejects Trump bid to lift order barring deportations
content: A federal appeals court has refused to lift an order preventing the Trump administration from deporting Venezuelan migrants to El Salvador under the Alien Enemies Act. The court upheld the temporary block on expulsions, reinforcing that migrants must have a chance to challenge their alleged gang affiliations in the US before deportation.

title: JD Vance to advance US dogfight over Greenland
content: The US intensifies its efforts to take over Greenland, sending Vice President JD Vance and his wife on a visit despite Denmark's disapproval. While locals and Europeans oppose the move, Washington highlights the strategic importance for international security and dismisses European concerns.

title: Women's Sweet 16 rankings: UConn is No. 1, USC holds tight at No. 4
content: uConn beat south Dakota State in the 2025 women's NCAA tournament . a torn ACL in her right knee is a season-ending injury . americans haven't reached the regionals, but there is plenty of movement in the rankings .

title: Already 2-0, Dodgers are the center of the spectacle on Opening Day
content: the Dodgers underperform this season . he faced his worst fear: nothing to do and nowhere to go . his teammate and winning pitcher was at the front of the room, sitting at a table and answering questions with expansive answers .

title: MLB predictions: From playoffs and World Series to MVPs and Cy Youngs
content: a comic book rendition of the biggest storylines of the upcoming Major League Baseball season gets underway tomorrow with Opening Day baseball . 28 of ESPN's MLB writers, analysts and editors on the spot to predict what will happen in baseball this year . a number of our voters have asked their voters to explain their opinions .

title: If Aaron Rodgers balks, what are Pittsburgh's prospects at quarterback?
content: the Pittsburgh Steelers have two quarterbacks on their roster as they await a decision from four-time NFL MVP Aaron Rodgers . despite the car wash of conversations, rodgers left Pittsburgh without agreeing to a deal . the former Jet and Packer is seemingly operating without a deadline even as his options narrow .

title: 2025 guide: Logos, coaches, key players and more
content: eight teams will play a 10-game season that culminates in a championship game on June 14 . the game will culminate with a game on march 28 between the St. Louis Battlehawks and Houston Roughnecks . here's a handy cheat sheet on the UFL basics .

title: Drake Maye gets No. 1 WR: Stefon Diggs immediately improves Patriots' offense
content: Stefon Diggs agrees on a three-year, $69 million contract with $26 million guaranteed . he's the best the Patriots have, a competitor and a worthy risk for the team to take . diggs' rehab is on course, and he is expected to be ready for Week 1 .

title: How Conversation Of Top Trump Officials Planning Attack On Houthis Unfolded
content: The screenshots of the chat on the "Houthi PC small group" showed top US officials discussing the time of strikes and types of planes used against Houthis.

title: "We Remain Committed...": PM Modi's Letter To Bangladesh's Muhammad Yunus
content: Amid frosty ties between Delhi and Dhaka, Prime Minister Narendra Modi has written to Muhammad Yunus, chief advisor to Bangladesh's interim government, wishing him on his country's Independence Day

title: "Consequences For US Pilots Could've Been Catastrophic": Yemen Chats Revealed
content: Following denials by US President Donald Trump, the White House and several top officials that no classified information was shared in the group planning an attack on the Houthis in Yemen on March 15, The Atlantic has shared the full text of the chat

title: "Time We Re-Wrote What Black Means": Kerala Bureaucrat To NDTV
content: Kerala Chief Secretary Sarada Muraleedharan, who triggered a huge conversation online about colorism after facing the brunt of it, told NDTV today that she had deleted her post and then restored it after being asked to by a number of people.

title: Trump Announces 25% Tariffs On Foreign-Made Vehicles
content: US President Donald Trump announced steep tariffs on auto imports Wednesday, in a move set to fuel tensions with trading partners ahead of further promised levies next week.

title: Kunal Kamra Gets 2nd Summons, Doubles Down With Digs On Nirmala Sitharaman
content: On a day the Mumbai Police sent him a second summons for his comments on Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde, comedian Kunal Kamra posted another satirical song, this time targeting Union Finance Minister Nirmala Sitharaman.

title: 'Pray Only To Allah': Mohanlal's Sabarimala Puja For Mammootty Sparks Row
content: A controversy has erupted after superstar Mohanlal offered prayers at Sabarimala for Malayalam star Mammootty earlier this month, with critics pointing out the latter is a Muslim and he must apologise if the 'puja' was done at his instance.

title: Rohit To Captain India In England Tests? BCCI To Announce Big Decision On...
content: Rohit Sharma will be leading the Indian cricket team in the upcoming Test series against England despite his poor show in Australia, according to a report.

title: Video: Student Detained By US Immigration Authorities, Visa Revoked
content: Federal authorities have detained an international student studying at Tufts University near Boston and have revoked their visa, the university said in a statement Tuesday night.

title: "Entity Of Concern": India Shreds US Religious Freedom Body Over RAW Demand
content: In a strongly-worded rebuttal, India said today that it is the US religious freedom body USCIRF that should be designated internationally as an "entity of concern" for its repeated "pattern of biased and politically motivated assessments".

title: Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's Car Hit By Bus In Mumbai, No One Hurt
content: A video showing the high-end car, with the Brihanmumbai Electric Supply and Transport (BEST) undertaking's ubiquitous red bus behind it, went viral on social media.

title: "Seen People Denying Runs": In Praising Iyer, Dig Taken At Milestone Chasers
content: Former India cricketer Aakash Chopra was full of praise for Shreyas Iyers innings of unbeaten 97 off 42 balls in Punjab Kings 11-run victory over Gujarat Titans

title: India, China To Have Issues "For The Foreseeable Future": S Jaishankar
content: As China and India push to mend ties, strained for nearly half a decade, Foreign Minister S Jaishankar said that "what happened in 2020 was not the way to address issues".

title: "Witch Hunt": Trump After Yemen Group Chat Leaked To Journalist
content: US President Donald Trump on Wednesday dismissed a scandal over leaked plans for Yemen air strikes as a "witch hunt" and defended his embattled Pentagon chief amid calls by Democrats for him to quit.

title: Water to be released today from Hidkal dam for drinking purposes in Belagavi

title: UFL threads: Breaking down the uniforms for each team
content: the united football league returns with a matchup between the Houston Roughnecks and the St. Louis Battlehawks . a merger between the USFL and XFL that was announced in September 2023 created the league . the defending champions will play at the Memphis Showboats at noon ET .

title: Saweety, Deepak Divorce Case: Shocked Boxer Alleges - "He Made Me..."
content: India's former world champion boxer Saweety Boora is in news after a video of her went viral on social media where she can be seen attacking her husband Kabaddi player Deepak Niwas Hooda amid divorce proceedings

title: Indians Bought 10 Maybachs, Worth At Least Rs 3 Crore Each, Per Week In 2024
content: India's luxury market is growing at an all-time high as Maybach sold around ten cars every week in 2024

title: Opinion: Can I Have A 'Non-Sexual' Mascara, Please?
content: Ever tried a blush called 'Orgasm'? Or a mascara that struts its stuff with the moniker, 'Better than Sex'? Sex sells. Brands know that all too well. Even if that means reducing women to mere sex objects.
